name: General Logan's Face Muskrat Wax (mustache wax)
description:
A fine mustache wax.
Housed in a screw-top tin and filled with only natural ingredients (no petroleum/dinosaur based ingredients here), this wax has goodness. 

I started making this as a personal quest to make a mustache wax not smell of chemicals, nor dissolve at the sight of soup, water fountains, or most importantly: beer. 

This particular formulation is dryer than some, which allows the curl yet with a distinct individuality to hairs. Perfect for oily or somewhat oily faces and it is flavored with orange essential oils. It's a favorite by a friend in the professional makeup field for being water resistant and having a pleasant smell (a needed relief for mineral gum adhered fake upper-lip-appendages).

This may last a well endowed lip sweater for about a couple of months or more.  Should you feel you'd like a different formulation in your arsenal of fine facial tools feel free to contact me as I may make an experimental batch from time to time.
